= Requirements =
  * This guide assumes you have gotten the basic SNEEK compiled based on the StarupGuide.

= Introduction =

A quick guide on how to build the di module.
[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]

= Compiling =
Compiling works the same way as the StartupGuide, the only difference is you need to enable #USBHAX in es/ES.c by removing the comment from it.

= di.bin creation =
Note: I will update the batch script to do this for you.

*1.* Copy the *00000001.app* from the same folder you downloaded using [http://wiibrew.org/wiki/NUS_Downloader NUSD] from the original guide to the SNEEK folder.

*2.* open a command prompt window and run elfins 00000001.app di/iosmodule.elf di.bin
